description: This Java class defines a REST controller that handles GET requests to the /docs endpoint, redirecting users to the Swagger UI documentation page while preserving host and scheme info through proxy headers.

classes.name: DocsController
classes.description: A REST controller that provides a redirect from /docs to the Swagger UI page, handling proxy headers to maintain original request details.

methods.name: docs
methods.description: Handles GET requests to /docs, constructs a URL to Swagger UI, and returns a redirect view while preserving the request's original host and scheme via headers.
